quest.name: The Eyes Have It
journal: U'rahtalo would confide in you about her troubles.

While happily unburdened by modesty, the U tribeswomen still expect their daily ablutions in the springs to not serve as a local attraction. Confront all the unwanted onlookers with /furious indignation.

Your righteous indignation has caused the oglers to flee for their lives. Anger is a gift, and it seems that the Twelve have been generous with your share. Make pleasant your countenance, and report the happy news to U'rahtalo.
U'rahtalo is well glad to be free of the madding crowd. However, it seems that she was not completely averse to the attention she was being offered.
objectives: Confront the oglers with a /furious anger.

dialogue.name: URAHTALO
dialogue.text: Have I got a job for you, adventurer! You'll be positively perfect. You can look dangerous, can't you?

dialogue.name: URAHTALO
dialogue.text: My sisters and I like to bathe here after a hunt, but lately, there have been oglers about. I've leapt out of the water to chase them off, but this only seems to swell their ranks! Will you chase them down and show them how furious I am?

dialogue.name: PEEPA
dialogue.text: Away with you! Can't you see I'm trying to focus here? Sheesh.

dialogue.name: PEEPA
dialogue.text: Ahhh! I'm sorry, m-m-madams-s-sir! No need to get angry, now! I-I have a problem, all right!? I was working it out with my mummy, and─uh, er, ah...

dialogue.name: PEEPB
dialogue.text: Now that is what I call nubile, mmm, mmm, mmmmmm...

dialogue.name: PEEPB
dialogue.text: Wh-Whoa, there! I-I'll never peep, I swear it by the Twelve! Gods, I'll see that look of fury in nightmares... <shudder>

dialogue.name: PEEPC
dialogue.text: These proportions...pure perfection! I must painstakingly record how the moonlightsunlight radiates off her skin...

dialogue.name: PEEPC
dialogue.text: Uh-oh... Uh... N-No need to get angry, lasslad! I was j-just measuring these, um, trees! Yes, these trees. Rather odd looking, eh!? Only doing my bit for science!

dialogue.name: PEEPD
dialogue.text: Ahhhhhh... The swaying trees, the peaceful water...the stunning, comely maidens...

dialogue.name: PEEPD
dialogue.text: Wh-What!? I said I liked the trees, too! It's not like...I'm only here...for the girls...

dialogue.name: PEEPE
dialogue.text: Oi, ye ain't got nothin' against a workin' man takin' a break from the heat, do ye? 'Course ye don't! But speakin' of heat, take a gander jus' over there, eh? Eh?

dialogue.name: PEEPE
dialogue.text: Oh, er, can't say as though I meant to offend ye, madamsir! Uh! W-Well, I'll be goin'!

dialogue.name: PEEPF
dialogue.text: Mine eyes are dazzled by how they shine! I am as one turned to stone. Those fair Miqo'te must be thaumaturges. Or conjurers. Or those other mages─the ones with the books!

dialogue.name: PEEPF
dialogue.text: Oh...oh, miladymilord... I... I have been tested and found most wanting. So easily was I blinded, trussed, and enfeebled. I must rise above these base impulses if I am to amount to anything!

dialogue.name: URAHTALO
dialogue.text: Ah, marvelous! Not an ogler in sight! You have my gratitude, adventurer. Though...having a good look at you...I suppose I wouldn't mind if you stole a peek now and then. Bet you didn't think my tastes ran that way, hmmm?
